title: Not unbanned after my ban timer is up??
body:
Today I am supposed to be unbanned at 8:17, it is 10:52 here and still no change in my ban status. I assumed it might be Pacific time so I waited a extra hour and my acc is still not unbanned. Anyone know anything about this?
{{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: If it continues, definitely submit a player support ticket and they can help you out.
Can you post the exact time as it says please?
I think it's all based on the riot server time, not your local time.

> [{quoted}](name=YerroFever,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=YOAe3ERO,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-06-12T03:23:03.641+0000)
>
> I think it's all based on the riot server time, not your local time.

Which apparently is on Pluto. Judging by how Clash went at least...
